meanings.sent1: The atypical weather caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: Her atypical behavior made her stand out from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: It was atypical for the cat to enjoy swimming in the pool.
meanings.sent4: The atypical color of the sky during the storm was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The atypical sound of the bird's song echoed through the forest.

meanings.sent1: The atypical design of the building drew attention from passersby.
meanings.sent2: His atypical approach to problem-solving yielded innovative solutions.
meanings.sent3: It was atypical for the dog to prefer vegetables over meat.
meanings.sent4: The atypical path she took in life led to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: The atypical pattern of stars in the sky formed a unique constellation.
